mapper.sql: id, acct_id, begin_date, begin_time, end_date, end_time, is_not_download, type, user_code, user_name, create_date
mapper.insert: insert into acct_query_hist(acct_id, begin_date, begin_time, end_date, end_time, is_not_download, type, user_code, user_name, create_date) values(#{acctId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{beginDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isNotDownload,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
